name: hamsite
description: This is a website for hair and makeup servies by Kaylee Derrick

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin about.html -d dist -o dist/about.html && usemin booking.html -d dist -o dist/booking.html && usemin formals.html -d dist -o dist/formals.html && usemin index.html -d dist -o dist/index.html && usemin seniors.html -d dist -o dist/seniors.html && usemin services.html -d dist -o dist/services.html && usemin weddings.html -d dist -o dist/weddings.html

author: Logan Derrick
